warrior.description:
Warrior cards represent brave fighters and form the foundation of your battle deck. 
 They are the initial category you'll encounter and serve as reliable frontline combatants.

hero.description:
Heroes are legendary figures renowned for their exceptional abilities and noble deeds. 
 These champions excel in combat, displaying unmatched skill and prowes.

creature.description:
Creature cards feature powerful and ferocious mythical creatures in Realms of Glory. 
 They bring strength and wildness to your deck, capable of overwhelming opponents.

titan.description:
Titan cards showcase mythical Greek Titans with immense power. 
 They possess overwhelming strength, capable of decimating opponents in battles.

god.description:
God cards represent divine entities with unparalleled power and supremacy. 
 They are the epitome of strength, reshaping the course of battles.
